com.qubulus.qps
Class RemotePositioningService

java.lang.Object
  Service
      com.qubulus.qps.AbstractPositioningService
          com.qubulus.qps.AbstractRssiPositioningService
              com.qubulus.qps.RemotePositioningService

public class RemotePositioningService
extends AbstractRssiPositioningService

A cloud-based positioning service implementation using signals collected by AbstractRssiPositioningService.

Configuration

The following settings must be provided as Android string resources:
qps_customer_id
Your secret customer id used for identification and authentication
qps_site_id
The id of the site whose fingerprint will be loaded and compared against RSSI readings
qps_server
The server address to send positioning requests to ("IP:PORT")
qps_switch_floor_queue_size
Queue size for number of consecutive hits before floor switch is accepted (default is 3)
qps_switch_floor_queue_time_tollerance
Timeframe in which consecutive floor hits are accepted as a floor switch (default is 30)

Permissions required

  • android.permission.WAKE_LOCK
  • android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION
  • android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE
  • android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE
  • android.permission.INTERNET
